properties.title: Luxurious 3BHK Apartment
properties.short_description: A stunning 3-bedroom apartment with breathtaking ocean views and modern amenities.
properties.long_description: This exquisite 3BHK apartment is located in the heart of Miami, offering panoramic ocean views. It features a spacious living room, a modular kitchen, and three well-lit bedrooms with attached balconies. The society includes a swimming pool, gym, and a children's play area, making it perfect for families.

properties.title: Cozy Countryside Cottage
properties.short_description: A charming 2-bedroom cottage surrounded by lush greenery in a peaceful countryside setting.
properties.long_description: Nestled in the picturesque hills of Asheville, this cozy 2BHK cottage is perfect for nature lovers. The property boasts a rustic interior with wooden flooring, a fireplace, and a private garden. Enjoy the tranquility of the countryside while being just a short drive from the city center.

properties.title: Modern Studio Apartment
properties.location: New York City, New York, USA
properties.short_description: A sleek and stylish studio apartment in the heart of downtown NYC with top-notch facilities.
properties.long_description: This modern studio apartment offers the best of urban living with state-of-the-art facilities. It features an open-concept design, floor-to-ceiling windows, a gourmet kitchen, and a luxurious bathroom. The building includes a rooftop lounge, a fitness center, and 24/7 security.

properties.title: Spacious 4BHK Villa
properties.short_description: A luxurious 4-bedroom villa with a private swimming pool and lush garden.
properties.long_description: This 4BHK villa in Los Angeles offers an unmatched living experience. It features a private pool, a large backyard, and an open-plan living area. Perfect for those who value privacy and luxury.

properties.title: Elegant 2BHK Apartment
properties.short_description: A stylish 2-bedroom apartment with stunning city views and modern interiors.
properties.long_description: Located in downtown Chicago, this 2BHK apartment boasts a contemporary design, high ceilings, and a balcony with breathtaking skyline views. Ideal for professionals and small families.

properties.title: Charming Beachfront Bungalow
properties.short_description: A beautiful 3-bedroom beachfront bungalow with direct access to the ocean.
properties.long_description: Wake up to the sound of waves in this stunning 3BHK beachfront bungalow. It features a spacious deck, a modern kitchen, and a private garden. Perfect for beach lovers!

properties.title: Luxury Penthouse
properties.short_description: A breathtaking penthouse with floor-to-ceiling windows and rooftop access.
properties.long_description: This ultra-luxurious penthouse offers an open-plan living area, a private rooftop, and a panoramic view of the city. High-end finishes and smart home technology make this a dream home.

properties.title: Classic Colonial House
properties.short_description: A stunning 5-bedroom colonial house with a large backyard and historic charm.
properties.long_description: This classic colonial house features original woodwork, a spacious backyard, and a newly renovated kitchen. Ideal for families looking for comfort and style.

properties.title: Compact 1BHK Condo
properties.short_description: A modern 1BHK condo in the heart of the business district, perfect for professionals.
properties.long_description: This compact yet stylish 1BHK condo is perfect for young professionals. It offers easy access to business hubs, a gym, and a rooftop garden.

properties.title: Riverside Mansion
properties.short_description: A grand riverside mansion with a private dock and a home theater.
properties.long_description: This luxurious mansion features high ceilings, marble flooring, and a private dock for boats. Enjoy stunning river views and a state-of-the-art home theater.
